column5: This guesthouse is situated in a private space within the gated backyard of the main house, and has a pool and garden view. We are conveniently located in Montrose (near the intersection of Montrose and West Alabama) on the edge of Downtown/Midtown Houston, just a 10 minute drive from NRG Stadium. Enjoy some of Houston's coolest spots in the hippest part of the city, or just lounge in your private living room or by the pool. Within a few blocks of the train btwn medical center and downtown.
